import React from 'react'; import HeaderImg from '../../assets/img/images/headerimg.png'; import Heart from '../../assets/img/images/heart.png'; export const Greyed = () => { return (

Now, you can select your items below and show your order to our waiter.

{item && item.length > 0 && item.map((i) => (

{i.name}

{i.likes}

setValue(i.id)} >Check Reviews

${i.price}

))}
